summary: This is an affidavit from a JPMorgan Chase Bank records custodian certifying the authenticity of bank records being produced in response to a subpoena in case number 2019R01059. The document establishes the foundation for admitting financial records as evidence in legal proceedings related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Dated
persons.role: Custodian of Records / Doc Review Sr Specialist II
persons.context: The affiant who certifies the authenticity of JPMorgan Chase Bank records being produced in response to a subpoena. They are a senior specialist in the National Subpoena Processing Department.

keyFacts: This is an affidavit from JPMorgan Chase Bank certifying financial records for case 2019R01059.
The affiant is a Doc Review Senior Specialist II and Custodian of Records in the National Subpoena Processing Department.
The document establishes the business records foundation for admitting bank records as evidence in court.
The affidavit was executed in Texas under penalty of perjury.
The document references numerous attached records (EFTA00124416 through EFTA00124586).
